column3: The date picker widget crashes when trying to assign a due date to a subtask within a large project template.
Received a double charge this month. Please investigate Invoice #PM2023-456 and issue a refund for the duplicate payment.
Requesting the ability to export Gantt charts directly to a high-resolution PDF format, preserving color coding and milestones.
Cannot log in using SSO credentials; the system reports "User not found" even though the SSO setup was confirmed last week.
The contrast ratio on the dark mode theme is too low for the status labels (e.g., 'In Progress' text on the blue background is hard to read).
The Slack integration stopped posting updates for completed tasks yesterday around 3 PM PST. Need assistance reconnecting or debugging the webhook.
We need conditional logic for task dependencies. Example: Task B can only be activated if Task A is completed AND Task C has an approved file attachment.
Need to downgrade from the 'Enterprise Plus' plan to 'Professional' immediately, as our team size has shrunk. How do I initiate this without losing existing data?
Loading dashboards that contain more than 50 active projects takes upwards of 45 seconds to render in the browser (Chrome 118).
What encryption standards are used for files uploaded to the platform, and is there any option for regional data residency (EU servers)?
